= Commercial Support =

== Technical Support ==
We offer a subscription plan for premium technical support via email at $1,899 per year per named contact.
This service includes the LTS (Long-Term Support) maintenance versions of ZKGrails.

== Custom Development ==
We also provide services at $45/hour for:
  * Developing or prototyping ZKGrails applications.
  * Implementing special features.
  * Creating custom builds.

Response time is no later than 2 business days. Contact: _zkgrails at gmail dot com_ for allocating time slots.
